item.description: YouthBuild Boston's Designery brings architects and Boston youth together in design-build workshops that teach them about designs that benefit their communities. On Thursday, December 15, from 5:00 to 7:00 pm, the Designery students host an open studio to showcase their design/build projects. Collaboration on design workshops has included area firms such as Maryann Thompson Architects, Kennedy & Violich Architecture, and Hacin + Associates Inc. See student design/build projects, meet the young designers, and network with EPNet. Afterwards, we’re headed out for complimentary food and drink!  RSVP to rsvp@architects.org by December 11 with “EPNet December” in the subject line.
item.name: Open Studio and Networking Event
